msbt.message: Gooooooood morning! I like to stretch out my words when I'm up this early. It gives my brain a few extra seconds to remember what comes next.
I don't know why, but I woke up super early today. Maybe I knew I was going to run into you!
Buon giorno, !My brain woke me up in the middle of the night for no reason, and I just rolled with it. Come see me in a few hours and I'll be delirious with fatigue, but right now? I'm peak !
You know what? <10_4 />I just don't feel like going to bed yet.I'm replacing my circadian rhythms with some sick drum and bass beats. Boots and cats and boots and cats

What's up, ?<10_4 /> Can't sleep? Me either.Sometimes in the middle of the night my mind can get to a real weird place, you know? It's great for coming up with new ideas for TV shows, cooking weird things, and literally nothing else!

Ah, good evening to you. Is that a weird thing to say? I don't usually stay up this late. Yeah, I don't know why, but my mind and body just aren't ready to rest yet. Maybe I was meant to stay up late tonight to run into you and have a deep conversation.<10_4 /> Or not. Ha HA!
